Equivalent to accessing [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/HasModel/jointNames] and [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/HasModel/jointTransforms] if used from an entity with a skeletal model.

# default

**Instance Property**

Accesses the first skeletal pose.

## Declaration

```swift
var `default`: SkeletalPoseSet.Element? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Equivalent to accessing [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/HasModel/jointNames] and [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/HasModel/jointTransforms] if used from an entity with a skeletal model.
title: default
